robeger writes:
> That's about what I figured, but thought it was worth asking about. 
> If I decide that I'll take a stab at implementing it, I'll let you know.

One alternative would be to create CDX files that contain just the
URIs for each seed, but spanning multiple ARCs. I expect this isn't
what you want (organizationally keeping the URLs physically together),
but it is a possible solution to one problem or another. :-)

    -tree
